channel.title: Server Null Problem
channel.description:
Hey. For the past days I have been playing my server with friends. I have had no problems until one day my friend wasnt able to log on. This has continued and I cant find any way to fix it.
Source: Pr0digyscape (Based on Delta) , but I edited a lot, made own client etc.
I had tried using the unedited version of pr0digyscape but got the same or similar errors.
This is the error found in runserver.bat :
[code]Servername. Original source:Servername Extra Features Coded by Username Connection from #.###.#.##:##### Connection from localhost:#### [client-1-Ancient]: Loading Process Completed [Regular player, lag: 141 ms] ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (#.###.#.##) [client-2-Redemption]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 141 ms] Connection from #.###.#.##:##### Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:10595) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:379) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:371) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:258) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (#.###.#.##) socket closed java.net.SocketException: socket closed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at client.fillInStream(client.java:9231) at client.run(client.java:17804) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) Game saved for player Redemption ClientHandler: Client Redemption disconnected (localhost) [/code]
Please Help.

item.title: Server Null Problem
item.dc:creator: @wegetmoney wegetmoney
item.description:
@wegetmoney wrote:

First restart your computer. then click run.bat when your computer turns on. your server simply crashed

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Redemptionz Redemptionz
item.description:
@Redemptionz wrote:

Hey. For the past days I have been playing my server with friends. I have had no problems until one day my friend wasnt able to log on. This has continued and I cant find any way to fix it.

Source: Pr0digyscape (Based on Delta) , but I edited a lot, made own client etc.

I had tried using the unedited version of pr0digyscape but got the same or similar errors.

Servername.
